stumble.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
stumble.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: In her hurry, she stumbled and spilled the milk all over the floor.
Vic stumbled over the step as he came in.
stumble.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to walk in an unsteady way and often almost fall
stumble.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He stumbled upstairs and into bed.
stumble.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to stop or make a mistake when you are reading to people or speaking
